results.title: Focal brain lactate accumulation in metformin-induced encephalopathy without systemic lactic acidosis: A case report suggesting mitochondrial vulnerability in lentiform fork sign
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ causes @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases_Metabolic @DISEASE_MESH:D001928 @@@metabolic encephalopathy@@@ in some @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end-stage chronic kidney disease@@@, resulting in @<m>DISEASE_Consciousness_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003244 @@@impaired consciousness@@@ and @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@.

citations.NLM: Hanazono A, Takahashi Y, Sanpei Y, Kamada S, Sugawara M. Focal brain lactate accumulation in metformin-induced encephalopathy without systemic lactic acidosis: A case report suggesting mitochondrial vulnerability in lentiform fork sign eNeurologicalSci. 2021 Dec;25():100383. PMID: 34917782

results.title: Case Report: A Case of Encephalopathy Presenting the Lentiform Fork Sign on MRI in a Diabetic Dialysis Patient
results.text_hl: Thus, the @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@encephalopathy@@@ was considered to be related to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment. He received hemodialysis treatment for 6 consecutive days, and his @<m>DISEASE_Consciousness_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003244 @@@consciousness disturbance@@@ and @DISEASE_Dysarthria @DISEASE_MESH:D004401 @@@dysarthria@@@ improved in 1 week.

citations.NLM: Ishizaki Y, Nishizono R, Kikuchi M, Inagaki H, Sato Y, Fujimoto S. Case Report: A Case of Encephalopathy Presenting the Lentiform Fork Sign on MRI in a Diabetic Dialysis Patient F1000Res. 2020;9():969. PMID: 34868569

results.title: Mitochondrial encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes diagnosed after metformin-triggered stroke-like episodes.
results.text_hl: He had been taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for 4 months.

results.title: Postop Complication With Euglycemic Diabetic Ketoacidosis in a Patient Receiving Empagliflozin
results.text_hl: We report the case of a 77-year-old female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@, treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Linagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069476 @@@linagliptin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@, who initiated a slurred speech and altered @<m>DISEASE_Consciousness_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003244 @@@level of consciousness@@@ in the postoperative period of a cholecystectomy.

citations.NLM: Fustiga J, Fernandes M, Dâmaso F, Duarte JA, Rodrigues C. Postop Complication With Euglycemic Diabetic Ketoacidosis in a Patient Receiving Empagliflozin Cureus. 2022 Dec;14(12):e33161. PMID: 36726923

results.title: Cellular stress and AMPK links metformin and diverse compounds with accelerated emergence from anesthesia and potential recovery from disorders of consciousness.
results.text_hl: Cellular stress and @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ links @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and diverse compounds with accelerated emergence from anesthesia and potential recovery from @<m>DISEASE_Consciousness_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003244 @@@disorders of consciousness@@@.

results.title: [Cognitive impairment probably related to repeated episodes of hypoglycemia. Report of one case].
results.text_hl: We report a 78 year-old @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@, treated with gliburide and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, consulting in the emergency room for a non fuctuating @<m>DISEASE_Consciousness_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003244 @@@impairment in consciousness@@@.

citations.NLM: Aizman A, Sanhueza A LM, Iruretagoyena M, Abbott E, Rodríguez JC, Rojas L. [Cognitive impairment probably related to repeated episodes of hypoglycemia. Report of one case]. Rev Med Chil. 2010 Oct;138(10):1285-7. PMID: 21279277

results.title: Fatality after deliberate ingestion of the pesticide rotenone: a case report
results.text_hl: After deliberate ingestion of up to 200 ml of a commercially available 0.8% @CHEMICAL_Rotenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012402 @@@rotenone@@@ solution, a 47-year-old female on regular @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ presented with a @<m>DISEASE_Consciousness_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003244 @@@reduced level of consciousness@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@metabolic acidosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Respiratory_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D012131 @@@respiratory compromise@@@.

citations.NLM: Wood DM, Alsahaf H, Streete P, Dargan PI, Jones AL. Fatality after deliberate ingestion of the pesticide rotenone: a case report Crit Care. 2005 Jun;9(3):R280-4. PMID: 15987402
citations.BibTeX: @article{15987402, title={Fatality after deliberate ingestion of the pesticide rotenone: a case report}, author={Wood DM and Alsahaf H and Streete P and Dargan PI and Jones AL}, journal={Crit Care}, volume={9}, number={3}, pages={R280-4}}

results.title: Acyclovir and hyponatremia: a case report.
results.text_hl: Domiciliary treatment included oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 850 mg every 24 hours and oral @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ 2.5 mg every 24 hours.

citations.NLM: Cortejoso L, Gómez-Antúnez M, Muiño-Míguez A, Durán-García ME, Sanjurjo-Sáez M. Acyclovir and hyponatremia: a case report. Am J Ther. 2014 Sep-Oct;21(5):e151-3. PMID: 23075578
